Name: mal-abdulhameedmada-la
Author: Abdul Hameed Madani And Kunhi Mohammed

Translations.Text: ivare ninnalute nattil ninnu purattakkuka, ivar parisud'dhipalikkunna alukalakunnu. ennu parannat matramayirunnu addehattinre janatayute marupati
appeal addehatteyum addehattinre bharya olicculla kutumbakkareyum nam raksappetutti. aval pintirinn ninnavarute kuttattilayirunnu
nam avarute mel oru taram mala varsippikkukayum ceytu. appeal a kurravalikalute paryavasanam ennaneyayirunnuvenn neakkuka

mad‌yankarilekk avarute saheadaranaya su'aibineyum (ayaccu.) addeham parannu: enre janannale, ninnal allahuve aradhikkuka. ninnalkk avanallate yatearu daivavumilla. ninnalkk ninnalute raksitavinkal ninn vyaktamaya teliv vannittunt‌. atinal ninnal alavum tukkavum tikaccukeatukkanam. janannalkku'avarute sadhanannalil ninnal kam'mivaruttarut‌. bhumiyil nanmavaruttiyatin sesam ninnal avite nasamuntakkarut‌. ninnal visvasikalanenkil atan ninnalkk uttamam

bhisaniyuntakkikkeantum, allahuvinre margattil ninn atil visvasiccavare tatannukeantum at (a margam) vakramayirikkan agrahiccukeantum ninnal patakalilellam irikkukayum arut‌. ninnal ennattil kuravayirunnittum ninnalkk avan vard'dhanav nalkiyat orkkukayum nasakarikalute paryavasanam ennaneyayirunnuvenn neakkukayum ceyyuka

nan enteannumayi ayakkappettirikkunnuvea atil ninnalil oru vibhagam visvasiccirikkukayum, marrearu vibhagam visvasikkatirikkukayumanenkil namukkitayil allahu tirppukalpikkunnat vare ninnal ksamiccirikkuka.avanatre tirppukalpikkunnavaril uttaman
